meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the primary vascular system in plants.
meanings.sent1: The provascular structure of the plant helps in transporting water efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the provascular system of the plant to understand its growth.
meanings.sent3: The provascular roots of the tree were so efficient that they never got thirsty.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was as strong and interconnected as the provascular system of a plant.
meanings.sent5: The provascular network in the plant was like a complex highway system, ensuring nutrients reached every part.
